title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 128 - New York City
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 128 - New York City

State Regulations
§ 128.1 - Repealed

Subpart 128-1 - General Provisions (§ 128-1.1 to 128-1.7)

Subpart 128-2 - Standards And Procedures For Regulated Activities And Noncomplying Regulated Activities (§ 128-2.1 to 128-2.10)

Subpart 128-3 - Regulated Activities (§ 128-3.1 to 128-3.15)

Subpart 128-4 - Water Quality Standards For Reservoirs And Controlled Lakes (§ 128-4.1)

Subpart 128-5 - Enforcement (§ 128-5.1)

Subpart 128-6 - Variances (§ 128-6.1)

Subpart 128-7 - Administration And Enforcement By Local Governments (§ 128-7.1 to 128-7.8)

Subpart 128-8 - Watershed Protection Plans (§ 128-8.1 to 128-8.4)

Subpart 128-9 - Severability (§ 128-9.1)

Subpart 128-10 - Appendices (§ 128-10.1 to 128-10.3)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 128

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§ 201[l][1], 1100; arts. 2, 11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
